Description.Details: A flexible weapon, AC/5s strike a balance between long range, power, and performance. These weapons are commonly found on medium 'Mechs as their primary source of reliable damage. AC/5s suffer from <color=#dd7e6b> -1 Recoil/refire penalty </color>, when continuously fired. Your pilots guts skill can counteract this. Additionally, <color=#f79924>this AC5 has a damage variance of +/- 3 points of damage.</color>
